Docs.summary: Represents additional metadata that is included in a request message to WCF Data Services.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Accept header of the request message.
Docs.value: The value of the Accept header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks No validation is performed on the value of the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestArgs.AcceptContentType%2A> property. Therefore, make sure that the supplied value is a valid value for an HTTP Accept header.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the headers in the request message.
Docs.value: The headers in the request message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The response is a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> object that contains key-value pairs of strings for each header in the request.
No validation is performed on the headers in the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceRequestArgs.Headers%2A> property. Therefore, make sure that you do not change an HTTP header in a way that changes the meaning of the request.
